channel.title: trimming on The long way through Software Craftsmanship

item.title: Trimming your plants
item.description: This post belongs to the growing-software series Imagine this situation: the code works. You are at this stage Disregarding the tests, the production code is complete. Could be better, but it is ready if you are in a hurry. Now, picture your test as a plant in a plant pot: it might be healthy on the outside (external quality) but how are their roots (internal quality)? Do you imagine them in an ordered fashion or in a jungle of roots?
